org.apache.ignite.stream.zeromq

Class IgniteZeroMqStreamer<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter<byte[],K,V>
      • org.apache.ignite.stream.zeromq.IgniteZeroMqStreamer<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class IgniteZeroMqStreamer<K,V>
extends StreamAdapter<byte[],K,V>
implements AutoCloseable
    This streamer uses https://github.com/zeromq/jeromq/. Implements socket types listed ZeroMqTypeSocket.

        public IgniteZeroMqStreamer(int ioThreads,
                            ZeroMqTypeSocket socketType,

                            @NotNull String addr,
                            byte[] topic)
        Parameters:
        ioThreads - Threads on context.
        socketType - Socket type.
        addr - Address to connect zmq.
        topic - Topic name for PUB-SUB socket type, otherwise null.
